name: Finaly Home (Clement Romanet, SebastienTeixeira)
description:
Embodies a ghost during his journey through a magical forest and use his spell to manipulate the movement of the environment.

Finaly Home, a game made by

Sébastien Teixeira, Clément Romanet and Victor-Elisée Lopez

Submission for the BYOG 2021, Theme : Reset

Music : 'Filament' from BreakingCopyright — Royalty Free Music
